definition: body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158

sentences.english: After leaving the smell of land behind him, he set his lines.
sentences.chinese: 在把陸地的氣息拋在身後之後，他放下了釣絲。

sentences.english: I'm still a bit of a behind-the-striker player when possible.
sentences.chinese: 如果有機會，我仍然會更接近前鋒身後的位置。

sentences.english: Bartender and a few bold people who followed him out.
sentences.chinese: 酒保和幾個大膽的人跟在他身後走了出去。

sentences.english: Father and Son go home with the tree, not knowing that they are followed by the animals.
sentences.chinese: 爺兒倆帶着樹回家，不知道動物們跟在身後。

sentences.english: The blind man is bound to find the grindstone behind him.
sentences.chinese: 盲人一定會發現他身後的磨石。

sentences.english: Ben turned his head to look behind him. The skeleton was only a few feet away.
sentences.chinese: 本轉過頭朝身後看了看，那骷髏離自己只有幾英尺了。

sentences.english: Install behind, was beautiful and charming and add seductive charm.
sentences.chinese: 成裝上身後，既漂亮嫵媚，又倍添誘人魅力。

sentences.english: The small expensive son doesn't know when seem in June after necrosis, certainly make a noise.
sentences.chinese: 小貴子不知何時出現在六月身後，悠然出聲。

sentences.english: What may count for more is that Mr Castro is increasingly preoccupied by his legacy.
sentences.chinese: 更重要的是卡斯特羅越來越關心他的身後事。

sentences.english: Each man must not think only of himself, but also of his buddy fighting beside him.
sentences.chinese: 每個人不能僅僅想着他自己，還有他身後戰鬥的同伴。

sentences.english: The butler turned and hurried into the house, slamming the door behind him.
sentences.chinese: 看門人拔腳朝屋裏跑去，門在他身後砰的一聲關上了。

sentences.english: Lunge past your foes with preternatural speed to attack them from behind.
sentences.chinese: 你衝到敵人身後，以不可思議的速度從後面攻擊他們。

sentences.english: And, during Feiler's battle with cancer, they would fight alongside him.
sentences.chinese: 在費勒與癌症鬥爭時，他們也在身後支持他。

sentences.english: Who can tell him what will happen under the sun after he is gone?
sentences.chinese: 誰能告訴他身後在日光之下有什麼事呢？

sentences.english: I am a tree with many branches, with fewer and fewer leaves on those branchlets each time you pass.
sentences.chinese: 一棵枝繁的樹，在你悄然的身後，葉子片片凋零。
